TEXT: Deal !SUMIREKO:D_ALL! damage to ALL enemies. NL
Deal !SEAL! damage to a random enemy.
ALL enemies lose !SEAL! Strength this turn.
Increases the effect of adjacent sumireko:Seals by !SEAL!.

EXTRA_TEXT: damage to the closest enemy at the end of each turn, then loses #b1 #yCharge
damage to ALL enemies in a line at the end of each turn, then loses #b1 #yCharge
